internal-medicine.name: Internal Medicine
internal-medicine.description: Our Internal Medicine department provides comprehensive care for adult patients, specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of various medical conditions.

pediatrics.name: Pediatrics
pediatrics.description: Our Pediatrics department offers specialized healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents, ensuring their healthy growth and development.

orthopedics.name: Orthopedics
orthopedics.description: The Orthopedics department specializes in treating conditions affecting the musculoskeletal system, including bones, joints, ligaments, and muscles.

general-surgery.name: General Surgery
general-surgery.description: Our General Surgery department performs a wide range of surgical procedures using advanced techniques and equipment.

obstetrics-gynecology.name: Obstetrics & Gynecology
obstetrics-gynecology.description: Providing comprehensive women's healthcare, from pregnancy and childbirth to gynecological treatments and procedures.

dental.name: Dental
dental.description: Our Dental department offers complete oral healthcare services, from routine check-ups to advanced dental procedures.

ent.name: ENT
ent.description: The ENT department specializes in diagnosing and treating conditions related to the ear, nose, throat, and related structures of the head and neck.

rheumatology.name: Rheumatology
rheumatology.description: Our Rheumatology department treats autoimmune conditions and diseases affecting joints, muscles, and soft tissues.

cardiology.name: Cardiology
cardiology.description: The Cardiology department provides comprehensive care for heart conditions using advanced diagnostic and treatment methods.

neurology.name: Neurology
neurology.description: Our Neurology department specializes in disorders of the nervous system, including the brain, spinal cord, and peripheral nerves.

psychiatry.name: Psychiatry
psychiatry.description: Providing mental health care and support through various therapeutic approaches and treatments.

ophthalmology.name: Ophthalmology
ophthalmology.description: Our Ophthalmology department offers comprehensive eye care services, from routine examinations to advanced surgical procedures.

urology.name: Urology
urology.description: The Urology department specializes in treating conditions of the urinary tract and male reproductive system.

pulmonology.name: Pulmonology
pulmonology.description: Our Pulmonology department diagnoses and treats respiratory conditions and diseases affecting the lungs.

nephrology.name: Nephrology
nephrology.description: Specializing in kidney diseases and disorders, providing comprehensive care including dialysis services.

anesthesiology.name: Anesthesiology
anesthesiology.description: Our Anesthesiology department ensures patient comfort and safety during surgical procedures through advanced anesthetic care.

radiology.name: Diagnostic Radiology
radiology.description: The Radiology department provides advanced imaging services for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.
